title: SuPreME: A Supervised Pre-training Framework for Multimodal ECG Representation Learning
details: M Cai, J Jiang, W Huang, C Liu, R Arcucci - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.19668, 2025
abstract: Cardiovascular diseases are a leading cause of death and disability worldwide. Electrocardiogram (ECG) recordings are critical for diagnosing and monitoring cardiac health, but obtaining large-scale annotated ECG datasets is labor-intensive …
